actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
  chuongtrinhtuthien.*,
  donggop.soTien,
  donggop.hinhThuc,
  donggop.thoiGian
FROM
  chuongtrinhtuthien
INNER JOIN
  donggop ON chuongtrinhtuthien.id = donggop.ChuongTrinhTuThien_id
ORDER BY
  {{Table1.sortOrder.column || 'chuongtrinhtuthien.id'}} {{Table1.sortOrder.order !== "desc" ? "" : "DESC"}}
LIMIT
  {{Table1.pageSize}}
OFFSET
  {{Table1.pageOffset}}
